para: Please report bugs to the Mandos development mailing list: mandos-dev@recompile.se (subscription required). Note that this list is public. The developers can be reached privately at mandos@recompile.se (OpenPGP key fingerprint 153A 37F1 0BBA 0435 987F 2C4A 7223 2973 CA34 C2C4 for encrypted mail).
